abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Sears an enemy unit with a spectral fire projectile that stuns and damages on hit, then slows and damages over time.
abilities.notes: Projectile speed: 1200. Cast range: 525. Projectile can be disjointed or spell blocked.

abilities.name: Bone Guard
abilities.description: The King can summon skeletons to fight for him.
abilities.notes: Gains 2 charges per hero kill and 0.5 charges per creep kill. Skeletons benefit from Vampiric Spirit's effects.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King has a chance to deal critical damage on his attacks.
abilities.notes: Gives Wraith King a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's undying loyalty to his subjects compels him to resurrect whenever he is slain.
abilities.notes: When killed, Wraith King will reincarnate after a short delay. Upon reincarnation, enemies near Wraith King are slowed.

innate_abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
innate_abilities.description: Provides lifesteal to Wraith King and his controlled units. When he would die, he instead enters Wraith Form, gaining unobstructed movement and bonus attack and movement speed.
innate_abilities.notes: Provides lifesteal for Wraith King and his Skeleton Warriors. Has reduced effectiveness on creeps (0.6 factor).
